item.title: Integration on SO(3)
item.description: This post is about numerical integration on $SO(3)$, i.e. how to approximate the solution of: $$ \frac{d}{dt} C(t) = C(t)[\omega(t)]_\times $$ given only $C(t_0) \in SO(3)$ and samples of $\omega(\cdot)$.

item.title: Derivation of the Bortz Equation
item.description: This post gives a derivation of the Bortz Equation, which is useful for deriving integration schemes for rotation matrices.

item.title: Directional Derivative of $\exp$ on $\mathfrak{so}(3)$
item.description: This post is about finding the directional derivative: $$ \left .

item.title: $SO(3)$ Integrals
item.description: This post is about a family of integrals that are important when computing state transition matrices in certain navigation problems as well as some other applications, namely: $$ C_n(v, T) : = \int_0^{T} \int_0^{s_n} \ldots \int_0^{s_2}\exp(s_1 [v]_\times) ds_1 \; ds_2 \;\ldots \; ds_n \qquad \; n \in \{1, 2, \ldots \}.

item.title: $\mathfrak{so}(3)$ Power Series
item.description: This post is about power series of the form: $$ \alpha_0 I + \sum_{n=0}^\infty \alpha_n [v]_\times^n.

item.title: Interesting Software
item.description: This post is a running list of some software projects I want to look into more or have found useful in the paste.

item.title: Interesting Algorithms / Concepts
item.description: This post will just be a running collection of useful algorithms / concepts I want to remember.

item.title: State Transition Matrices
item.description: This post has a few tricks for deriving state transitions matrices.

item.title: Notation
item.description: This page covers the mathematical notation used in a number of the posts on this blog.

item.description: This note reviews important properties of what you might call the cross product matrix.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! My name is Mark Tobenkin, I’m a software engineer specializing in control and estimation systems.
